item.title: 伯利对折旧的不满让大型科技公司的利润成为焦点
item.description: 大科技公司不断创造利润的能力支撑着投资者对这些股票的持续热情，而不管其估值是否飙升。但如果这些数字被夸大了呢？【原文：Big Tech’s ability to churn out ever-increasing profits has underpinned investors’ ongoing enthusiasm for the stocks regardless of their soaring valuations. But what if those numbers are overstated?】

item.title: 欧足联的失误导致俱乐部每年损失高达 2.32 亿美元
item.description: 根据主要咨询公司之一麦肯锡的估计，欧足联决定在 Covid-19 大流行后撤消计划中的救援基金，这使足球俱乐部每年损失高达 2 亿欧元（2.32 亿美元）。【原文：UEFA’s decision to pull a planned rescue fund following the Covid-19 pandemic is costing football clubs as much as €200 million ($232 million) a year, according to an estimate by McKinsey, one of the major consultancy firms.】

item.title: 市场动荡不安，牛市期待强劲的盈利前景
item.description: 美股最近的小幅下挫动摇了三年牛市的大部分支柱。不过，迄今为止，美国企业的利润基础尚未受到破坏。【原文：The latest mini-selloff in US stocks has shaken most pillars of the three-year bull market. So far unblemished, though, is the support from Corporate America’s profit foundation.】

item.title: 针对马科斯的指控加深了菲律宾的贪污丑闻
item.description: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯（Ferdinand Marcos Jr.）的办公室周五否认这位领导人与日益加深的腐败丑闻有任何牵连，此前一位卷入该丑闻的前立法者提出了指控。【原文：Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr.’s office on Friday denied any involvement of the leader in a deepening corruption scandal, following accusations from a former lawmaker embroiled in the issue.】

item.title: 塔塔汽车公司乘用车利润因一次性收益而提升
item.description: 塔塔汽车乘用车有限公司（Tata Motors Passenger Vehicles Ltd.）公布的九月份利润增长，主要得益于大量的一次性收益，这有助于缓解捷豹路虎公司（Jaguar Land Rover）因网络攻击导致生产受阻所带来的影响。【原文：Tata Motors Passenger Vehicles Ltd.’s posted a profit rise for the September quarter, boosted by massive one-time gains that helped cushion the impact of a production-halting cyberattack at its Jaguar Land Rover unit.】

item.title: 通胀前景更加明朗，瑞士法郎飙升至十年新高
item.description: 瑞士法郎兑欧元汇率攀升至 10 年来的新高，原因是对通胀走强的预期和美国降低关税的前景刺激了对避险货币的需求。【原文：The Swiss franc climbed to a 10-year high against the euro as expectations of stickier inflation and the prospect of lower US tariffs bolstered demand for the haven currency.】

item.title: 谷歌在德国购物诉讼案中被判赔偿 5.73 亿欧元
item.description: 继欧盟对搜索引擎巨头谷歌提起诉讼后，Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司在德国比价网站提起的两起反垄断损害赔偿案件中被勒令支付 5.73 亿欧元（6.66 亿美元）。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google was ordered to pay €573 million ($666 million) in two antitrust-damages cases brought by German price-comparison websites following on from a European Union case against the search-engine giant.】

item.title: 中国宇航员在太空滞留后返回地球
item.description: 三名中国宇航员因飞船被碎片撞毁而滞留太空，现已返回地球。【原文：Three Chinese astronauts who were stuck in space after debris crashed into their spacecraft have returned to Earth.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行在 "克里姆林宫的傀儡 "指控后撤消了对贡渥集团的资助
item.description: 西班牙桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）撤回了对贡渥集团的融资承诺，据熟悉此事的人士称，美国财政部上周在社交媒体上将这家大宗商品交易商描述为 "克里姆林宫的傀儡"。【原文：Spain’s Banco Santander SA pulled funding commitments from Gunvor Group after the US Treasury described the commodity trader as “the Kremlin’s puppet” in a social media post last week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧尔班称美国将在匈牙利福林出现挤兑时提供帮助
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班周五表示，如果福林受到投机者的攻击，美国政府将支持匈牙利。【原文：The US administration is set to support Hungary if the forint comes under attack by speculators, Prime Minister Viktor Orban said Friday.】

item.title: 为什么保罗-凯德罗斯基说人工智能是所有泡沫的集合体？
item.description:
为什么长期存在的越共认为我们无法降落这架飞机？【原文：

Why the longtime VC thinks we can't land this plane.

】

item.title: 里夫斯将放弃增税计划，因为英国的经济预测有所改善
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）已经能够放弃提高所得税的计划，因为她从英国预算监督机构那里得到了一个更好的财政预测。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves has been able to drop plans to raise income taxes because she received an improved fiscal forecast from the UK’s budget watchdog, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 奇货可居：人工智能是所有泡沫的集合体 (播客)
item.description: 奇货可居：人工智能是所有泡沫的集合体 (播客)【原文：Odd Lots: AI Is Like Every Bubble All Rolled Into One (Podcast)】

item.title: 德国将 2026 年计划新增借款净额提高 80 亿欧元
item.description: 根据立法者周五签署的 2026 年预算草案，德国联邦政府明年的新借款净额将比原计划多出 80 亿欧元（约合 93 亿美元）。【原文：Net new borrowing by Germany’s federal government will be €8 billion ($9.3 billion) more than originally planned next year, according to the draft 2026 budget signed off by lawmakers on Friday.】

item.title: 瑞典失业率意外飙升，经济复苏希望渺茫
item.description: 瑞典的失业率出人意料地创下了九个月来的新高，这让北欧国家当局感到失望，因为他们最近曾表示经济前景正在好转。【原文：Sweden’s jobless rate unexpectedly hit a nine-month high in a disappointment for the Nordic nation’s authorities who have recently suggested the economic outlook is brightening.】

item.title: 香港因出口和零售业复苏上调国内生产总值预测
item.description: 香港上调了对 2025 年全年经济增长的预期，这表明在出口和国内消费表现出出乎意料的强劲之后，人们对经济发展势头的信心有所增强。【原文：Hong Kong raised its full-year growth forecast for 2025, signaling increased confidence in the economy’s momentum after exports and domestic consumption showed unexpected strength.】

item.title: 印度政府准备将绿色项目拍卖公司上市
item.description: 印度政府正准备将一家专注于绿色项目的联邦拍卖公司--印度太阳能有限公司（Solar Energy Corp. of India Ltd. ）--上市，希望利用全国对清洁能源股票的热情来套现。【原文：India’s government is preparing to list a federal auctioning firm focused on green projects, Solar Energy Corp. of India Ltd., in the hopes of cashing in on the national enthusiasm for clean energy stocks.】

item.title: 比特币熊市加深，ETF 投资者撤资 8.7 亿美元
item.description: 随着避险情绪席卷整个市场，投资者从投资比特币的基金中撤资近 9 亿美元，比特币进一步跌破 10 万美元大关。【原文：Bitcoin fell further below the $100,000 mark as a bout of risk aversion sweeping across markets saw investors pull nearly $900 million from funds investing in the token.】

item.title: 资深交易商认为棕榈油将在生物燃料的推动下创下三年新高
item.description: 资深贸易商多拉布-米斯特（Dorab Mistry）表示，如果全球供应受到生物燃料用量增加的挤压，棕榈油价格可能会在明年第一季度飙升至每吨 5500 林吉特（1332 美元）的三年新高。【原文：Palm oil prices may surge to a three-year high of 5,500 ringgit ($1,332) a ton in the first quarter of next year if global supplies are squeezed by rising use in biofuels, according to veteran trader Dorab Mistry.】

item.title: SAP有望躲过欧盟因软件调查而开出的反垄断罚单
item.description: SAP SE有望躲过反垄断罚款，因为欧盟将就该软件巨头提出的解决对其软件管理程序调查的建议征求反馈意见。【原文：SAP SE is on track to dodge an antitrust fine as the European Union will seek feedback on an offer from the software giant to settle an investigation into its software management program.】

item.title: Tether 计划 "大幅 "扩展商品交易借贷业务
item.description: 稳定币巨头Tether Holdings SA首席执行官保罗-阿多诺（Paolo Ardoino）表示，在向大宗商品交易商提供了价值约15亿美元的信贷后，Tether Holdings SA计划 "大幅 "扩大对大宗商品交易商的贷款。【原文：Stablecoin giant Tether Holdings SA plans to expand “dramatically” in lending to commodities traders after extending roughly $1.5 billion worth of credit to the sector, Chief Executive Officer Paolo Ardoino said.】

item.title: 里夫斯的税收转向重燃预算忧虑，英镑走软
item.description: 据报道，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将在本月的预算中放弃提高所得税的计划，这再次引发了人们对英国财政状况的担忧。【原文：The pound underperformed its major peers on Friday as reports that Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves is dropping plans to raise income tax at this month’s budget reignited concerns over the nation’s finances.】

item.title: 印度最大贷款机构支持又一波银行合并浪潮
item.description: 印度国家银行（State Bank of India）支持国家支持的贷款机构再次掀起合并浪潮，因为政策制定者正在探索如何在全球增长最快的主要经济体中扩大规模并为增长提供资金。【原文：State Bank of India is supportive of another wave of mergers among state-backed lenders as policymakers explore ways to build scale and finance growth in the world’s fastest-growing major economy.】

item.title: 反犯罪、反移民的主张推动了智利基督教民族主义者卡斯特的发展
item.description:
九个孩子的父亲、欧尔班和博尔索纳罗的盟友何塞-安东尼奥-卡斯特（José Antonio Kast）希望驱逐无证移民，让智利重新变得安全。【原文：

José Antonio Kast, a father of nine and ally of Orbán and Bolsonaro, wants to expel undocumented migrants to make Chile safe again.

】

item.title: 制裁破坏了俄罗斯石油运输商通往中国的北极航线
item.description: 由于美国的制裁，俄罗斯通过北冰洋的石油运输正遭遇越来越多的延误，这是一个新的例子，说明美国的制裁措施正在给莫斯科的能源贸易增加摩擦。【原文：Russia’s oil shipments through the Arctic Ocean are encountering increasing delays because of US sanctions, a fresh example of how the measures are adding friction to Moscow’s energy trade.】

item.title: 印度与加拿大在美国加征关税之际深化能源与矿产关系
item.description: 根据一份联合声明，印度和加拿大将共同努力确保关键矿产和清洁能源供应链的安全，这标志着在美国政策导致的贸易紧张局势下双边关系的重启。【原文：India and Canada will work together to secure supply chains in critical minerals and clean energy, according to a joint statement, signaling a reset in bilateral ties amid trade tensions driven by U.S. policies.】

item.title: 贝莱德将与 ACS 组建价值 20 亿欧元的数据中心合资企业
item.description: 贝莱德公司已同意支付高达 20 亿欧元（23.3 亿美元），与西班牙工程公司 ACS SA 成立一家数据中心合资企业。【原文：BlackRock Inc. has agreed to pay up to €2 billion ($2.33 billion) to form a data center venture with Spanish engineering firm ACS SA.】

item.title: 南非顶级航空公司与工会在 20 国集团峰会前达成协议
item.description: 南非最大的航空公司 FlySafair 表示已与机组人员达成协议，在南非主办 20 国集团峰会前一周结束了赔偿问题上的僵局。【原文：South Africa’s largest airline, FlySafair, said it reached an agreement with cabin crew, ending a deadlock over compensation a week before the country hosts world leaders at the Group of 20 summit.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：里夫斯考虑放弃提高所得税计划，英镑下跌
利雅得银行获得 15 亿美元贷款，中东地区对亚洲的贷款创历史新高
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯最大的贷款机构之一利雅得银行（Riyad Bank SJSC）获得了一笔 15 亿美元的银团贷款，主要来自大中华地区的银行。【原文：One of Saudi Arabia’s largest lenders, Riyad Bank SJSC, has secured a $1.5 billion syndicated loan, primarily from banks in Greater China, as Middle Eastern borrowers tap Asian bank liquidity at record level.】
